ModMetaData.name: [1.0] Wands and Spells
ModMetaData.author: FantasyFan
ModMetaData.description:
Have you ever wanted to be a wizard and craft different wands and spells. Now you can.
This mod adds six different wands: -Wand of Damage - Tier I (like revolver) -Wand of Damage - Tier II (like bolt-action rifle) -Wand of Destruction - Tier I (like frag granades) -Wand of Destruction - Tier II (like Doomsday Rocked Launcher-Single Use) -Wand of Fire (like incendiary launcher) -Wand of Electromagnetism (like EMP granades-Industrial)
This mod adds three spells: -Spell of Energy (like Orbital Power Beam) -Spell of Wind (like Tornado Generator) -Spell of Destruction (like Orbital Bombardement Targeter)
Two new workbenches: -Wand wood working table (to craft wands and wand components) -Spell writing table (to write spells and craft silver ink)
Ten research projects
One two plants: -Elysium Tree (Get the wood used for crafting wands) -Spell Papyrus (Get the papyrus to make mysterious paper to write spells)
Can be safely added to existing saves.
If you find things unbalanced, please make suggestions for improvement.
